content: make your very own amigurumi ash j williams and defeat the deadites ash is the main character of *ash vs evil dead* comedy-horror television show it s an intermediate level pattern that requires very small amounts of yarn that s the good news the not-so-good news is since the pattern has a lot of details it requires a bit of sewing and embroidery skills working with wires and wire cutters and a whole lot of patience the chainsaw is detachable and the arms are wired which means you can pose his arms at different angles and take super awesome photos the amigurumi is 8 5 inches tall and can stand on its own without any support **materials** sock weight yarn in black brown blue light peach grey red white 2 5mm hook fiberfill 12mm black safety eyes a small piece of plastic sheet a pair of scissors three 6mm blue round buttons yarn needle sewing needle sewing pearl headed pins stitch markers black sewing thread keychain metallic stud sticker i used eight silver studs 16 gauge wire wire cutter masking tape **terminology us ** chain chain magic_ring st stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet blo back loop only bpsc back post single_crochet fpsc front post single_crochet increase increase decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch 4-double_crochet bobble st **finished size ** 8 5 inch **skill level ** intermediate
